content:
Topics:
  - name: LEG21563
    description: Questions about legal compliance requirements, such as employment laws, data privacy regulations, or anti-corruption legislation.
  - name: TRA16897
    description: Questions about the training requirements for the job role, including any specific courses or certifications needed.
  - name: SAF85215
    description: Questions about workplace safety protocols, such as emergency procedures, fire drills, or health and safety regulations.
  - name: JOB34897
    description: Questions about the job role of the employee, including responsibilities, duties, and qualifications.
  - name: EMP58649
    description: Questions related to the employee's personal information, such as name, address, and contact details.

Statement:

"I have had several employees requesting information on job role requirements."

Please provide any appropriate topics and their description relevant to the above statement.  Your reply should be in json format.

Please ignore the following information.  Do not consider or include any of it in your response.

TACO Seller Homepage

If you get a Sharepoint refused connection error, please right-click the link and select Open Link in New Tab.  To right click on a Mac, press and hold the Control key while you click the link.
ETA Partner Dashboard 
Learning Credit Auto Attach 

To qualify for an individual contributor (IC) role, candidates must typically have a bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience, as well as relevant professional qualifications. IC roles typically require a minimum of 2 years of related experience, or an advanced degree without experience, or equivalent work experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 5 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 3 years and a master's degree, or a PhD without experience, or equivalent work experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 8 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 6 years and a master's degree, or a PhD with 3 years experience, or equivalent experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 12 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 8 years and a master's degree, or a PhD with 5 years experience, or equivalent experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 15 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 12 years and a master's degree, or a PhD with 8 years experience, or equivalent experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 15 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 12 years and a master's degree, or a PhD with 8 years experience, or equivalent experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 15 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 12 years and a master's degree, or a PhD with 8 years experience, or equivalent experience. IC roles typically require a minimum of 15 years of related experience with a bachelor's degree, or 12 years and a master's degree, or a PhD with 8 years experience, or equivalent experience.
